issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Unable to close the right app drawer when using the back menu button (it extends the screen instead). 

*Test Steps:*
# Download KitchenSink-v2 (https://github.com/appcelerator/kitchensink-v2)
# Build the app to a android 6.0 sim (Nexus 5x in this case)
# Go to {{Phone -> Drawer}}
# Press toggle Right 
# Press the back button (top left)

*Actual result*
The Right drawer becomes full screen.

*Expected result*
The right drawer should close.
fields.summary: Android: Right App drawer on Kitchen sink does not close when pressing the back menu button
fields.environment:
SDK version 8.2.0.GA
Android version: 6.0.0 Nexus 5X 
Operating System
  Name                     = Mac OS X
  Version                   = 10.15.1
  Architecture            = 64bit
  CPUs                      = 8
  Memory                  = 16.0GB

Node.js

  npm Version                 = 6.9.0

  Core Package          = 7.1.1

Titanium CLI

  node-appc Version      = 0.2.49
